name: Vinay Bagra
position: 5th Year UG, IIT Kharagpur | Ex-Events head @Spring Fest | Ex-Software Engineer Intern @CloudKaptan and  @MasterTag | Tutor @Kunduz
about: Highly motivated and results-driven Data Analyst with a strong foundation in data analytics and the recent completion of the Google Data Analytics Certificate. Proficient in analyzing complex datasets, uncovering trends, and translating data into valuable insights that drive strategic decision-making. I am passionate about leveraging data to solve business challenges and optimize processes. With a keen eye for detail and a strong analytical mindset, I excel in data visualization, statistical analysis, and data-driven problem-solving.

current_company.name: Spring Fest
current_company.title: 5th Year UG, IIT Kharagpur | Ex-Events head @Spring Fest | Ex-Software Engineer Intern @CloudKaptan and  @MasterTag | Tutor @Kunduz

positions.subtitle: Spring Fest
positions.description: -Successful organised Spring Fest 2022 in an hybrid mode.-Coordinated sponsorship drive in Hyderabad and Kolkata raising INR 7 lakhs, a 37% YoY increase than the previous year.-Coordinated International Carnival, inviting artists from Taiwan, Germany, Hong Kong, Brazil, Italy, Denmark, Singapore, Sweden, Canada Poland, and Florida.-Individually responsible for 5 Corporate Deals for Spring fest 2022.-Co-headed a team of 50 Associate Members, expanding the reach of the fest to 700+ colleges and publishing 250+ media article-Conducted Nation Wide Prelims of 4 Events (Dance/Music/Dramatics) in Kolkata , Bhubaneshwar and Ranchi with 102% YoY increase in participation-Solely responsible for the conduction of a Genre of Fine arts Fest for the first time which included paint It and also increase the participation in it by 100%.-Spearheaded publicity campaign with a 404% YoY increase in participation from Rajasthan and Gujrat by publicizing the fest in over 150 colleges.
positions.title: Core Organising Team Member
positions.description_html:
-Successful organised Spring Fest 2022 in an hybrid mode.
-Coordinated sponsorship drive in Hyderabad and Kolkata raising INR 7 lakhs, a 37% YoY increase than the previous year.
-Coordinated International Carnival, inviting artists from Taiwan, Germany, Hong Kong, Brazil, Italy, Denmark, Singapore, Sweden, Canada Poland, and Florida.
-Individually responsible for 5 Corporate Deals for Spring fest 2022.
-Co-headed a team of 50 Associate Members, expanding the reach of the fest to 700+ colleges and publishing 250+ media article
-Conducted Nation Wide Prelims of 4 Events (Dance/Music/Dramatics) in Kolkata , Bhubaneshwar and Ranchi with 102% YoY increase in participation
-Solely responsible for the conduction of a Genre of Fine arts Fest for the first time which included paint It and also increase the participation in it by 100%.
-Spearheaded publicity campaign with a 404% YoY increase in participation from Rajasthan and Gujrat by publicizing the fest in over 150 colleges.

experience.title: Secretary - Welfare
experience.description: - Conducted Inhaling session, Mental health session , Photography event , Graffity ,etc- Managed the Hall budget to build up a welfare room
